attributes.action: PULL OUT ALL THE STOPS to find and bring to trial those Whitehall people who used their computers to slur Hillsboro fans.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do is in upper case letters above.  You seem, so often, unable to see what we want you to do.  We hope this is helpful.

The people need to know if the civil service was also involved in covering up police corruption over the Hillsboro case.  You need to find out and bring whoever it was, to trial.
